title: Everyone having trouble viewing their year in review.
body:
Veldari made a post in this thread:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/KI2Y2HW6-share-your-2016-season-in-review-highlights

Saying that it worked for them, viewing it on the NA website not the OCE one.
I tried it and it worked for me also. 

So im re-posting their advice here to make it more visible.
Hopefully it works for most people experiencing this problem. ^^


_________

**Peek into my stats:**
Most played {{champion:136}} 
Most deaths from {{champion:157}}  _(no surprises there)_: 381
Most kills on {{champion:157}} _(methinks Yasuo might be played too much :P)_: 415
Pressed {{champion:136}}  W 14,794 times.
(Apparently) synergize best with {{champion:238}} support.....  ummm...
Besk KDA {{champion:127}} 32.00
Worst winrate against {{champion:127}}: 30%
Best winrate against {{champion:38}}: 70%

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: I had the same with Yasuo, most kills and deaths from him, pretty obvious and its saying something....

My stats (in case anyone was wondering [probably not though]):
Most played - {{champion:133}}
Best winrate vs - {{champion:420}} 100%
Most kills vs - {{champion:157}} 54 YAY!
Most deaths vs - {{champion:236}} 46
Ward average - 15.7
Earliest Bazza - 20:14
{{champion:133}} Blinding Assaults - 1,488
Recommended for 2017 - Quinn Jungle (definitely going to try this)
when u say most kills on yasuo, what do u mean exactly, same with most deaths

Of all the champions in the game, Yasuo killed me the most.
and Vice versa, of all the champs in the game, the one I killed the most was Yasuo.
_(probably because there are just so many of them, its statistically likely that you'll kill more of them.)_

At least thats how I understand the statistics the page gave.
